means: [医]蛆：昆虫之软体幼虫，特别是寄生于腐肉中者。绿蝇(Phaenicia sericata)及黑花蝇(Phormia regina)之活蛆被用以治疗骨髓炎及其他化脓性感染，以清除坏死组织及促进伤口愈合

sentence.Network_en: The rattailed maggot, for example, possesses a'snorklelike " telescopic air tube.

entry.def: Maggots are creatures that look like very small worms and turn into flies.

means.word_mean: 1. the larva of the housefly and blowfly commonly found in decaying organic matter

example.en: He snapped the maggot over the rail.

example.en: You maggot!Take your hands off me!
